posts.post_content:
@ People who say "I think he should have shroud or regen, or other things":  
  
DO that; make a deck with cloaks, regens, and run 4 of this guy, and have a ball. It's annoying when people complain about a card not having invincibility when the whole point of the game is to design a deck to supplement/protect awesome cards.   
  
He only costs 5 to drop. Which means you could either have a cloak on the board and cast him for 7 with cloak equip, OR, cast him for 7 with Negate. Maybe have some sniper regen spells ready. This an amazing game-winner and very cheap at 5 CMC.
posts.html:

He only costs 5 to drop. Which means you could either have a cloak on the board and cast him for 7 with cloak equip, OR, cast him for 7 with Negate. Maybe have some sniper regen spells ready. This an amazing game-winner and very cheap at 5 CMC.
